name: virtualization_mcp
description: Professional VirtualBox management server with comprehensive VM operations, networking, storage, and security features
long_description: VirtualizationMCP is a production-ready MCP server that provides comprehensive VirtualBox management capabilities including VM lifecycle management, networking configuration, storage operations, snapshots, templates, and advanced security features. Built with FastMCP 2.12+ for maximum compatibility and performance.

vbox_install_path.title: VirtualBox Installation Directory
vbox_install_path.description: Directory where VirtualBox is installed (e.g., C:\Program Files\Oracle\VirtualBox)

vbox_user_home.title: VirtualBox User Home
vbox_user_home.description: Directory where VirtualBox stores VM files and settings

prompts.name: create_vm_guided
prompts.description: Get guided help for creating a virtual machine based on your use case
prompts.text: I need help creating a ${arguments.os_type} virtual machine for ${arguments.use_case}. Please recommend appropriate configuration (memory, CPU, disk, network) and guide me through the setup process.

prompts.name: troubleshoot_vm
prompts.description: Get help diagnosing and fixing virtual machine issues
prompts.text: I'm having ${arguments.problem_type} issues with virtual machine ${arguments.vm_name}. Please help me diagnose the problem and provide step-by-step troubleshooting guidance.

prompts.name: setup_network
prompts.description: Get guidance on network configuration for your use case
prompts.text: I need to configure ${arguments.network_type} networking for ${arguments.use_case}. Please explain the configuration and guide me through the setup process.

prompts.name: snapshot_best_practices
prompts.description: Get recommendations for snapshot management strategy
prompts.text: I need help with snapshot management for ${arguments.vm_name}. Please recommend a snapshot strategy including when to create snapshots, naming conventions, and cleanup policies.

prompts.name: multi_vm_deployment
prompts.description: Get guidance for deploying multi-VM architectures
prompts.text: I want to deploy a ${arguments.deployment_type} multi-VM architecture. Please recommend the VM configuration, network topology, and guide me through the deployment process step by step.
